nav.div: Mossyrock School District » News » What's New » School Closure Update #6

a.title: Your Input is Needed: Superintendent Search Survey

div.a: Your Input is Needed: Superintendent Search Survey

div.p: Dear Mossyrock Students and Families,
We hope you are staying safe and well! Below is the schedule for the upcoming week as well as information about work packets and Chromebook checkout.
Schedule for the week of April 20:
Breakfast and lunch delivery at bus stops and pick up (8-9 a.m.)
Meals for Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday
Elementary work packets due
New elementary work packets delivery and pick up (8-9 a.m.)
Breakfast and lunch delivery at bus stops and pick up (8-9 a.m.)
Meals for Thursday and Friday

p.strong: Work Packet Delivery and Due Dates

div.p: We have create a Continuous Learning Plan to support the continued connect and growth of our students. We will continue to improve the plan throughout the remainder of the school year. The packet delivery and due date schedule is below:
Thursday, April 24 Monday, May 4 *elementary only
Thursday, May 7 Monday, May 18
Thursday, May 21 Monday, June 1
Thursday, June 4 Monday, June 15
Thursday, June 18 Summer Work Packet
After April 24th, both elementary and Junior High/High School packets will be delivered and due on the same schedule. We hope this simplifies the schedule for families!

Teachers will continue to check-in weekly with each student. They are also working to schedule a weekly class session via Zoom or Google Meet. Principals and teachers will share additional details in the coming week.
We want our students to have the tools they need for their learning, so we are checking out Chromebooks to students to use at home for their learning. The process is simple:

ul.li:
Complete the form (available here and on our website)
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1DaZmdsh8LbHe7iPb6F0_1mNkB_V5n0ttDCm459Y0qtU/edit?ts=5e972b27 (English)
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1WslMlORWTw6sJ5Rfmfw6Q6neHWTRNOzlHlwjXOkOqRk/edit (Spanish)
If the form is received by Tuesday, the Chromebook will be ready for pickup on Thursday of that week
Sign the Removal Contract and the Access Consent form
Take your Chromebook home to help support your child’s learning

Come to pick up the Chromebook at one of the designated times
Thursday mornings during meal pick up between 8 and 9 a.m.
Thursday afternoons between 4 and 6 p.m.
Thursday, April 23
Thursday, April 30
Thursday, May 7

div.p: We are here to serve your child’s needs. If you have any questions, please email or call. Please stay safe and contact us if you have questions or concerns.
Thank you,
Lisa Grant
Superintendent

Mossyrock School District
Success Belongs to Everyone
